snippet: A Pentagon official urged Congress not to modify the statute providing the legal basis for battling the perpetrators of 9/11.
abstract: Pentagon official Michael A Sheehan says evolving war against Al Qaeda is likely to continue at least 10 to 20 years and urges Congress not to modify 2001 statute, known as authorization to use military force, that provides its legal basis; lawmakers are considering enacting new authorization due to fragmentation of Al Qaeda and emergence of new threats elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: A Pentagon official urged Congress not to modify the statute providing the legal basis for battling the perpetrators of 9/11.

headline.seo: Pentagon Official Urges Congress to Keep Statute Allowing War on Terror Intact
headline.main: Debating the Legal Basis for the War on Terror
headline.print_headline: Debating Legal Basis For the War On Terror
